attires.name: Dirndl
attires.description: A traditional dress worn in Southern Germany, especially Bavaria, Austria, and South Tyrol. It consists of a bodice, blouse, full skirt, and an apron.

attires.name: Trachtenhemd
attires.description: A traditional shirt, usually white or checkered, worn with Lederhosen. It often has embroidery on the front.

attires.name: Janker
attires.description: A traditional boiled wool jacket, often with contrasting trim and horn buttons. It is a key part of Tracht.
